metadata.title: 2002 Eastern Bering Sea Upper Continental Slope Biennial Groundfish Survey

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)

metadata.description: To successfully sample randomly placed stations within six geographic subareas and five depth strata distributed between 200-1,200 m.
metadata.notes:
